entry.tran: (高尔夫球场上位于开球区与果岭之间的)球道
entry.def: The fairway on a golf course is the long strip of short grass between each tee and green.

means.word_mean: 1. the area between the tee and putting green where the grass is cut short
2. the usual course taken by vessels through a harbor or costal waters
3. a tract of ground free of obstacles to movement
